1135220.name: Tidewoken
1135220.description:
Tidewoken is a free-to-play multiplayer turn-based dungeon-crawler. Make your team of characters and learn new skills to find the strongest combinations, outsmart your opponents, and beat challenging dungeons. Tidewoken combines many layers like theory-crafting, tactical gameplay, impactful positioning, and team-building.

Embark on your adventure in Tidewoken with the assurance that the entire game awaits you - completely free.

Join a growing community of adventurers and participate in events, join forces with friends, or compete in thrilling PvP battles to make your mark on the leaderboards.

Explore hundreds of skills

Customize your characters with up to 12 skills, including a game-changing legendary skill, and 4 pieces of equipment. In Tidewoken, every skill is unique and offers a variety of strategic uses, combo potentials, and exciting synergies that can turn the tide of battle.

Find new skills and equipment in dungeons, or earn Twokens to acquire them in the in-game store. Defeat dungeon bosses and earn their unique legendary skills for your character to equip.

Dungeons

Explore the beautiful landscapes of the dungeons in Tidewoken, where monsters and daunting bosses await. Choose your difficulty, ranging from a fun and casual experience together, to challenges only well-prepared teams can master. If you adventure through the dungeons alone, you can control up to 4 of your characters, or choose from various AI-controlled companions.

Core features:

  • Dungeons - Each dungeon has multiple rooms and monsters with distinctive behaviors. Bring up to 3 other players with you, or try to beat them alone.
  • Customize your characters - Dive into our in-depth character editor, where hundreds of skills and endless combinations await. Each decision shapes your strategy and playstyle.
  • Competitive PvP - PvP in Tidewoken is centered around fair and competitive matches. No luck-based values, no random effects, 100% pure skill.
  • Measure your plays - Your influential actions are logged into the combat log. View the impact of your damage, healing, and protection in the detailed scoreboard.
  • Handcrafted maps - Although the focus is on gameplay, I do my best to provide stunning visuals and interesting environments to play in.
  • Progression - Gain experience and earn Twokens from fights and achievements to unlock new skills, equipment, cosmetics, and more.
  • Matchmaking - 1 vs 1 matchmaking is supported on launch, with more game modes being added later.
1135220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
